p: The COVID-19 pandemic is the most profound “volatility, uncertainty, complexity, and ambiguity” (VUCA) 1 challenge of the millennium. The emergence of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), a medium-sized RNA virus, in the city of Wuhan, Hubei Province, China has resulted in a disease burden that has overwhelmed health systems and collapsed economies 2, 3.
